page.title: 15CHILDREN'S GAMES.
page.content: For two baller you need two small balls and a wall. You throw the balls onto a wall after each other and you sing a little song to go with the game. This game can be played with only one person at a time. Here is one of the songs that we sing as we play: Chocolate biscuit down the lane, tell me how to spell my name, and then you spell out your name. Another game is skips. You need a rope and yourselves. You try not to step on the rope. The skipping rope goes round for so many beats then as you jump in they turn the rope round with one person on each end.As we skip we sing: Mothers in the kitchen doing a bit of stitching in comes somebody and pushes her out. Now when one person goes in another one has to follow and the one that was in first has to go out. A.HUNTER AGE 10 AND J.HIGGINS AGE 10
